title: Activated carbon with composite pore structures made from peanut shell and areca nut fibers as sustainable adsorbent material for the efficient removal of active pharmaceuticals from aqueous media
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00262H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sujata Mandal, Dayana Stephen, Sreeram Kalarical Janardhanan
The massive growth in the human population along with advancements in healthcare, have led to various active pharmaceuticals entering into the water stream, causing harmful genotoxic, mutagenic, and ecotoxicological effects on all living organisms.
